radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis and a small left pleural effusion. Mild thickening of the common bile duct wall with associated hyperenhancement likely related to recent ERCP. The pancreas is diffusely enlarged with marked peripancreatic fat stranding and a small amount of free fluid. Numerous calculi in both kidneys.
